5.089045 - SELECT  COUNT(notes.id) as count from notes where notes.status =0 and notes.user_id_to=14
6.074905 - SELECT orders.*,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.order_details) as order_details,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.payment) as payment,
        shop.domain
         from orders
         LEFT JOIN  shop on  orders.shop_id = shop.id
         WHERE orders.id=851467
5.327940 - SELECT order_item.* from order_item
                                  where order_item.order_id=851467
11.501074 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(contents, '$.nl')) as contents FROM product WHERE id=296552
5.446911 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(title, '$.nl')) as title FROM product_meta WHERE product_id=296552 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
5.130053 - SELECT * FROM product_url WHERE product_id=296552 AND lang='nl' ORDER BY id DESC
5.574942 - SELECT *,JSON_UNQUOTE(price) as price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.181074 - SELECT *,JSON_UNQUOTE(measurements) as measurements FROM product_measurements WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.032063 - SELECT * FROM b_2_b WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.179882 - SELECT order_item_attribute.* , attribute.attribute_group_id, attribute.name->>'$.nl' as title from order_item_attribute
               left join attribute on order_item_attribute.attribute_id = attribute.id
               where order_item_attribute.order_item_id=258
5.472898 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(contents, '$.nl')) as contents FROM product WHERE id=99999999
5.465031 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(title, '$.nl')) as title FROM product_meta WHERE product_id=99999999 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
5.218029 - SELECT * FROM product_url WHERE product_id=99999999 AND lang='nl' ORDER BY id DESC

               where order_item_attribute.order_item_id=259
5.353928 - select * from selektvracht where order_id =851467 order by id
5.258083 - SELECT notes.* , users. name as user_from_name from notes
            LEFT JOIN users on notes.user_id=users.id
            where notes.order_id=851467 order by created_at DESC
5.493164 - SELECT * from users order by name
5.217075 - SELECT orders.id,orders.status_id,shop.domain,orders.created_at
         from orders
         LEFT JOIN  shop on  orders.shop_id = shop.id
         WHERE  orders.id != 851467
          and ((orders.order_details->>'$.address.payment.zipcode'= '5581BD'
         and orders.order_details->>'$.address.payment.houseNumber'= '2'
         and orders.order_details->>'$.address.payment.street'= 'Engelmondstraat')
         or (orders.order_details->>'$.customerEmail' = 'k.vankaathoven@veldvest.nl'))
8.203983 - select id,sku from product where active=1
5.157948 - select id,title,template_id from order_status order by id
5.381107 - SELECT attribute.id, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute.name, '$.nl'))  as name,JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute_group.name, '$.nl')) as attribute_group_name FROM attribute LEFT JOIN attribute_group ON attribute.attribute_group_id = attribute_group.id where attribute_group_id =1 order by name

5.481005 - SELECT * from users order by name
9.234905 - Select activity_log.*,users.name from activity_log
        left join users on users.id= activity_log.user_id
         where task !='' and subject_id =851467 and subject_type ='Orders' Order by id Desc
5.491018 - Select order_status_changes.*,users.name from order_status_changes
        left join users on users.id= order_status_changes.user_id
        where order_id = 851467 Order by created_at Desc
5.646944 - SELECT * FROM users WHERE id=14
